ygData.subject: Re: Skull of Jhen Tra (how to use it **Spoiler**)
ygData.msgSnippet: Either way you go, 1H or 2H, you will miss out of some items.  From what I ve seen, the best staves are all 2H, but there are other things which can be held in
ygData.messageBody:
Either way you go, 1H or 2H, you will miss out of some items. From what
I've seen, the best staves are all 2H, but there are other things which can
be held in an unused hand which are cool. Weigh the two, see which you
prefer and choose that. That's my advice.

Tandayen, Dark Elf Wizard

>>From: "Spehar, David J" <David.Spehar@...>
>>
>>Finally, and answer!!!
>>
>> To use the skull you simply have a one handed weapon equipped or two
>>free hands. Place the skull in an open hand and Viola!! +20 mana and +2
>SV
>>Magic. I believe you can use two skulls as well but you will have no
melee
>>weapon. This is going to be my practice in a group. Or I may keep two
>>skulls on me and use them in emergency for that quick Gate away or that
>>finally spell to blast the mob to hell!.
>>
>>Enjoy your skulls!
>>
>>BTW: Identify (lore items) is not totally working yet. They haven't put
>the
>>descriptions in on most items yet (per Verant website).
>>
>>- Ziffnab
